translation.supprimer_joueurs_modal_texte: Are you sure you want to delete all players already registered?
translation.supprimer_joueur_suggestions_modal_texte: Are you sure you want to permanently remove this player from suggestions?
translation.supprimer_tournoi_modal_texte: Are you sure you want to delete tournament #{{id}}?
translation.retour_liste_parties_bouton: Return to the list of games
translation.supprimer_tournoi_actuel_modal_texte: Are you sure you want to delete the current tournament n°{{id}}?
translation.regle_enfants: - Never have 2 children play on the same team:
translation.regle_adversaires: - Players may have the same opponent at most:
translation.description_melee_demelee:
Players can play solo or in fixed teams.
Matches can be played head-to-head, doublettes or triplettes.
It's possible to complete a match with a triplette or head-to-head
translation.description_championnat: Players meet only once during the tournament
translation.description_coupe:
A random 1st round then qualification if victory otherwise elimination from the tournament.

Currently unavailable: pool phase
translation.regle_adversaires_modal_informations_tou: Players may have the same opponent at most:
translation.erreur_generation_options: The generation cannot work with the selected options
translation.erreur_generation_options_regles: You can try disabling the option to never form the same teams or to prevent players from meeting too often.
translation.erreur_generation_joueurs_speciaux: There are too many children or shooters or pointers to apply the option to have them play separately.
translation.erreur_generation_regle_equipes: It seems too complicated to never play identical teams
translation.joueurs_enfants_explication: Child players are players who cannot play on the same team
translation.doublette_multiple_2: In doublette, the number of players must be a multiple of 2
translation.triplette_multiple_6: In triplette, the number of players must be a multiple of 6
translation.equipes_trop_joueurs: Some teams have too many players
translation.nombre_equipe_multiple_2: The number of teams must be a multiple of 2
translation.configuration_impossible_coupe: In cup, the number of teams must be 4, 8, 16, ...
translation.equipe_doublette_multiple_4: With doublette teams, the number of players must be a multiple of 4
translation.equipe_triplette_multiple_6: With triplette teams, the number of players must be a multiple of 6
translation.tete_a_tete_multiple_2: In tête-à-tête, the number of players must be a multiple of 2
translation.complement_tete_a_tete: Number of players not a multiple of 4, the selected option will form a tête-à-tête
translation.complement_triplette: Number of players not multiple of 4, selected option will form triplettes
translation.blocage_complement: Number of players not multiple of 4, please select the option to form triplets to complete if you want to throw
translation.champ_invalide: One of the fields is not valid
translation.indiquer_nombre_points_victoire: Indicate number of points to win:
translation.options_regle_enfants: Never play 2 children on the same team
translation.choix_regle_equipes: Choose never to form the same teams
translation.options_regle_adversaires: Players can have the same opponent at most:
translation.options_regle_complement: In doublettes, if the number of players is not a multiple of 4, then the extra players will be put in:
translation.options_terrains_explications: Before starting the tournament, create a list of fields that will be assigned to the matches
translation.supprimer_donnees_modal_texte: Are you sure you want to delete all data (player lists, old tournaments, fields, etc.)?
